blockquote.p: The first design of the Laboratory Report foresaw that only one DiagnosticReport was allowed in the Bundle.
The idea was that the DiagnosticReport was used only for representing the entire report; and when a group of results needed to be managed, the Observation resource would be used for this scope.
This choice seems however not yet globally agreed. In some contexts in fact the DiagnosticReport is intended to be used also a grouper of Laboratory results (e.g. panel).
For this reason, in this ballot version, the option of having a multiple DiagnosticReport entries has been added.

p.b: Ballotters are invited to express their opinions on this choice
